alert.note: Alert for Saratoga; Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 11:55AM EST until December 21 at 5:41AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Hadley. * WHEN...From this evening to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, water reaches moderate flood stage inundating East River Road in several spots. Water also floods Old Bend Road in the Town of Moreau. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 17.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Hadley Flood Stage: 14.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 9.5 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 10.0 Mon 7 pm 14.0 Tue 1 am 16.4 Tue 7 am 17.3 Tue 1 pm 17.7 Tue 7 pm 17.7 Wed 1 am 17.3 Wed 7 am 16.5 Wed 1 pm 15.6 Wed 7 pm 14.7 Thu 1 am 13.8 Thu 7 am 12.9 &&
